Package javelin.controller.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    GaveUp
    Used when any sort of procedural generation has reached it's limit so it can be given a chance to restart the process in the hopes of not being locked-up again.
    RepeatTurn
    Let's an Action finish execution at any point without causing the game to advance with the current Combatant turn.
    RestartWorldGeneration
    Instead of making sure World is being properly generated, it's easier to just give up when too many tries are reached, and just try a best-effort algorhitm.
    StopThinking
    Throw when the time limit is up for ThreadManager.
    UnbalancedTeams
    Thrown when the Ai generates an unfair battle, generally because it was the best possible effort.
